entry.title: Washing Up Dishes
entry.summary:
Author: Veiva

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,317Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: Buck kept thinking of all these big goals he was planning on achieving but then thought about the little things, like his goal of learning about the entire periodic table to help Christopher with his homework, he needed to buy Maddie that necklace she was eyeing for her next birthday, and even the pile of dirty dishes imitating Mount Everest in his kitchen sink back in his loft. It was bizarre the sorts of things one thinks of as they are dying and Buck shed a tear as he reminded himself of all of them. All he wanted was just five more minutes to wash up his dishes. Buck spends a shift at the 118 flipping between the old injury on his leg and rehashing the memories of how his leg came to be. Whumptober Day Nine: "We'll Make It Alright to come undone"Touch |Flashbacks | Scalding

entry.title: Something Just Like This
entry.summary:
Author: penpen_xo

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,851Chapters: 3/10Kudos: 9

Summary: 6 months into a life post Bobby, Captain Hen Wilson needs to fill a vacant spot on A Shift. She just never expected her former captains hand to play into her decision. Buck can't believe Hen has made them get a probie, and he's determined more than ever to keep her at arms length. He just got Eddie and Christopher back in his life, things are settling down a little, and he just can't afford to let anyone else into the family again, because it would just be another person you can lose. He doesn't realise that he and probationary firefighter Rosie Bishop actually have an awful lot in common. or Season 9 story.Buddie focused + OC and lots of firefam feels as the team heals and learns to open their hearts again, helping a young girl find her place in a very lonely world along the way.

entry.title: You Make Loving Fun
entry.summary:
Author: beetlesandstars

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,694Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 108

Summary: “You want any cockporn?” Buck’s pretty sure he must’ve heard wrong, except— Eddie sucks in a sharp breath. Buck rolls over to stare at him, open-mouthed. Eddie blinks, face suddenly unreadable.  “Cockporn?” Buck asks, only barely holding back a guffaw.   “Cock…porn. I meant popcock— oh my God,” Eddie slaps at his own face, squeezing his eyes shut. “Cockp— no, popcock— shit!”  “Take your time,” Buck tells him. Knows his voice is full of mirth.  Eddie exhales, relaxing his face. “P-O-P-C-O-R-N.”  “There you go.”  Face beet-red, Eddie mumbles, “Shut the fuck up. I’m gonna get– that. The corn, in its popped, um… form.”  Pursing his lips, Buck nods along sagely. “You do that.” Or: the boys at college.

entry.title: We both went through it together, or did we?
entry.summary:
Author: Buddieforever1111

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,193Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 21

Summary: Great, he wasn’t getting through that door anytime soon. His eyes wander around the room. It’s a boring four-by-four brick-walled covered room, and the floor beneath him is cold, hard, and concrete. It’s a basic room with nothing in it, except for him and a man curled up in the corner. Wait? What? A man curled up in the corner of the room with his knees pulled tightly to his chest and his bruised, pale face staring at the wall in front of him. He barely noticed him in the corner; he was quiet, almost stoic, and had obviously been here long before he was. Or... Eddie is kidnapped and thrown into a room all alone until he spots another person in there with him. Maybe he's not alone, but who is the man in the corner? How long has he been here? Can they trust each other to get out of here together? Will their bond keep them close? Or will they be separated when the opportunity arises?

entry.title: i had all and then most of you, some and now none of you
entry.summary:
Author: neonweeknds

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,128Chapters: 5/24Kudos: 19

Summary: Buck was riding the high of his first successful solo debut, still nursing the ache of someone who walked away, when he got news that blindsided him—his upcoming solo tour wouldn’t be so solo after all. He’d be sharing the stage with Eddie Diaz, a rising country star with a mysterious past and a sound that was quickly blowing up. At first, Buck hated the idea. The last thing he wanted was to split the spotlight he’d fought so hard for. But then he actually got to know Eddie. The problem? Buck had always blurred the line between friendship and something more—and with Eddie, it was getting harder to tell the difference. or the pop star evan buckley and country singer eddie diaz slow burn angsty friends to lovers au.

entry.title: like a feather of flames on me
entry.summary:
Author: Val_in_a_trenchcoat

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,139Chapters: 7/22Kudos: 53

Summary: Evan – Buck – Buckley is a twenty-eight-year old broke college student recently ripped away from his childhood dream job as a firefighter after a life-shattering accident left him permanently disabled. Living on what’s left of his savings while going to college won’t keep him fed, though… but nobody has to know about his scandalous job on the side with Redline Pleasure Anonymous Call Agency. Eddie Diaz is a recently divorced, thirty-year-old college professor and father to the best kid in the world. In light of his recent split, though, he’s made a discovery: his sexuality might not be as straight and narrow as he’s always thought. Instead of panicking, though, he makes the safe, sensible (and budget-breaking) decision to set a hypothesis and test it by calling in to a sex hotline to talk to a male agent. Everyone experiments in college, right? Even the professors. Enter the mysterious Firehose – the hot voice on the other side of the line that Eddie can’t get out of his head.And Buck might just be getting a little crush on the hot professor he keeps doing silent study sessions with in the college library.What will they do when it all collides?

entry.title: lover come over
entry.summary:
Author: sh3llf_liffe

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,797Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 40

Summary: Evan “Buck” Buckley just went platinum for the third time, he’s topping the charts again and again, his diaristic and diverse album collections only growing in popularity and sales. What he blames on personal shortcomings, his fame truly skyrocketed after his worst moments were posted for all the world to see during the Tour Bus Bombing, but having his name and picture plastered on every news station and magazine for four months really made it hard not to know at least his top three songs. Now, a new tour is starting and Eddie Diaz, bodyguard and former army medic, comes into the picture.Buck may come off as a suave singer who had it all and is battling through recovery, but he’s been fighting to keep his head above water since his teens. Eddie has a way of getting through this unserious exterior, but can he handle all of the grief that he’s bottled up for so long? cw: past child death and adult suicide discussed and described, last voicemail of dead adult played

entry.title: Keep This Between Us
entry.summary:
Author: byebyeimwriting

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,363Chapters: 3/7Kudos: 18

Summary: Eddie bites his lip, hesitates. Then he laughs, a small, almost sheepish sound. “Can I tell you something kind of selfish?”Buck nods immediately, heart thudding, because anything Eddie says is already his favourite thing in the world.“I don’t want to tell anyone. Not yet. Only Chris.” His voice is careful, testing, as if the words might shatter between them. He presses a quick kiss to Buck’s mouth before continuing, almost shy. “Not because I’m scared. Just because… I like this being ours. Just ours. Like the whole world doesn’t get to touch it yet.”The relief that blooms in Buck’s chest is so strong it makes his eyes sting again. He gets it. Fuck, he gets it.He squeezes Eddie’s hips, grounding them both. “Yeah,” Buck whispers. “Let’s keep it just for us a little longer.”or5+ times Buck and Eddie sneak around and 1 time they don’t need to.

Author: anon_user18

Summary: Oh Fuck! Oh Fuck! Eddie thinks to himself. His face grows red and nerves start to fill every pore of his body. Of course his lab partner is Buck, of course it is. Eddie freaking bluescreens at the attractive guy in front of him. “Uhhh- Y-you know my name?” Eddie asks back like an idiot because he is acting like one right now. Buck laughs! * Or the buddie High School Sweethearts fic aka MY first fic ever!*

entry.title: a ghost in this house
entry.summary:
Author: meriwethersays

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,902Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 26

Summary: “I’m sorry I lied about living in the house,” Buck says, which isn’t the same as apologizing for getting back together with Tommy. “I thought you liked the house.” Eddie’s strangely hurt at the thought that Buck didn’t want to live there. “We have so many good memories there.” Buck looks like Eddie has just grabbed him by the throat and squeezed. “Yeah,” he says, and he’s even hoarse. “Yeah, we have—” He coughs and takes another drink.
